name: ubuisland
description: === Ubu Island === Contributors: bacarbon Requires at least: 6.0 Tested up to: 6.5.2 Requires PHP: 5.7 License: GPLv2 or later License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

scripts.start: npm run wp-env:start && npm run theme:activate
scripts.theme:activate: wp-env run cli wp theme activate $npm_package_name
